alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:24PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Otero County through 500 PM MDT... At 423 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Higbee to near Timpas. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Junta, North La Junta, Rocky Ford and Swink. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strong winds may spread well away from precipitation. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
